[set page_title]Layout export[/set] [set help_name]layoutdownload.main[/set] [set icon_name]admin/icon_config.gif[/set] @@UI_STD_HEAD@@
 

There isn't anything you need to do in order to perform a layout export.
Just click the button below, and a full layout tree will be written to /home/local/tallyman-2.0.6/stores/art/tmp/layoutdownload.txt.
